title: File:British-Troops-Distribute-Food-In-Port-Said-1941-142341993629.jpg
author: Unknown photographer
description:
British Troops Distribute Food In Port Said.
British troops are seen 'besieged' by a crowd of clamorous Egyptians as they distribute food from a lorry to the native population of Port Said. One of the cordon of soldiers guarding the lorry seems to be discouraging an over-eager Egyptian from climbing on board. Port Said, at the northern end of the Suez Canal, is now under the control of the Anglo-French military forces.
